analysis.key_quote: I oppose the creation of the Schedule Policy/Career as a new category of Excepted Service under 5 CFR Part 213. Moving career civil servants into a category of at-will employment makes those civil service positions vulnerable to political manipulation and influence.
analysis.rationale: The comment explicitly opposes the proposed rule, citing concerns about politicization, due process rights, and the undermining of a merit-based civil service system. The emphasis on protecting civil servants from political influence and maintaining their rights aligns with a strong opposition to the rule.
